page.title: 07THE GAME OF SKITTLES
page.content: The game of Skittles is a bit like ten pin bowling.You have a heavy wooden ball and nine pins(large wooden stumps).the idea of the game is to knock down as many as possible.In the centre of the set of pins is alarger pin called the{Kingpin.}At one end of the{Skittle Alley }(name given to the runway where you roll the ball along) is a large metal strip.When you bowl you have to make sure that the ball pitches onto this metal strip.You have 3 balls against nine pins and this is called a{"hand"}and for every pin knocked down you score a point.If you knock down all nine pins with one ball it is called a{"flopper"}and you earn an extra ball.Teams compete in Skittle Leagues.Most alleys are in pubs and clubs and both men and women play.
